author: Doug Bostrom
content:
Carbon is so wonderful until it isn’t. Leaving aside collisions, it’s surprising to see these boats falling apart in conditions that while pretty sporty are routinely shrugged off by other sailing vessels.

author: Jean-pierre Declemy
content: Has SHK/Scallywag reached Chile? There seems to be a news blackout on where they are and what they are doing.
